p: The microstructures of the SEABs were observed with an SEM (Model ABT-150S, Topcon Corp., Tokyo, Japan). The samples were placed on a double-sided adhesive tape fixed on an aluminum stub. The samples were then covered with a gold-palladium coating (Model JBS-ES 150, Ion Sputter Coater, Topcon Corp., Tokyo, Japan). The accelerating potential was 15 kV.
